recipesJson.name: Jolly Old Pipe
recipesJson.author: ChemicalBurnVictim
recipesJson.description:
A smooth, full bodied spiced tobacco. Perfect for a late night by the fireplace. Maybe you’ll have some whisky, maybe you won’t. You probably should. 

Full notes [here](https://reddit.com/r/DIY_eJuice/comments/d8mm0g/sweet_and_smokey_seasonal_recipes/)
